title: LEGO Super Heroes Marvel Captain America Civil War Airport Battle
description: Join forces with Captain America in this LEGO Super Hero set and team up with Scarlet Witch, Ant-Man and Agent 13 to help Winter Soldier escape in the awesome Quinjet. Enter the air traffic control tower with Ant-Man in this epic Airport Battle, and explode the boxes in front of the tower. Push the lever in the second-floor office to explode the walls. Explode the luggage cart to send suitcases flying, then transform Ant-Man into Giant Man to take on Iron Man. Flip out the wings of the Quinjet to take off and deploy the hidden stud shooters. Drop the rope for Captain America and fly away! This action packed set comes complete with 8 minifigures, a Quinjet, control tower, carrier and assorted accessories. Brand LEGO Dimensions Packaged: H28 x W54 x D8cm Lego Type LEGO Super Heroes Material Plastic Model name / number 76051 Number of pieces 807 Suitable From 8 years Toy Character Marvel Warning! Not suitable for children under 3 years. Brand Story The company that was destined to become LEGO started life as being a small workshop that produced wooden toys, run by Ole Kirk Christiansen in 1932. The name ‘LEGO’ was adopted in 1934, coming from the Danish phrase ‘leg godt’, which means ‘play well’. It wasn’t until 1947 that they started producing plastic toys, with the first version of the now infamous interlocking bricks coming in 1949. They weren’t quite the bricks that people are used to nowadays, being made from a different material and having a slightly different locking system. It was actually Christiansen’s son Godtfred Kirk that saw the potential for the bricks to become a tool for creative play and in 1958, the modern brick design was born. From this date, despite variation in the design and purpose of individual pieces over the years, each remains compatible in some way with previous pieces. So you could have a LEGO set from 1958 and it would still be completely compatible with a modern set. Since the 1960, thousands of sets have been released covering everything from Aliens to the Wild West. The only area that the company has never tackled directly is military-themed sets, because Ole Kirk set a policy that they must never make war seem like child’s play. The largest ever LEGO set to date is a scale-model of the Taj Mahal, which was made out of 5922 pieces. The LEGO Group's motto is ‘det bedste er ikke for godt’, which roughly translates to "only the best is the best". Ole Kirk Christiansen came up with this phrase to encourage workers to always produce the highest quality toys possible. Nowadays, LEGO makes a vast range of toys for all ages, as well as teaching materials for children, which are distributed in over 130 countries. The company has approximately 10,000 employees and is the world's third largest manufacturer of play materials.

For inspiration, Mugler draws on his love of architecture, his passion for travel and his childhood memories. As a fashion designer, Mugler creates new materials and shapes that turn stars like Jerry Hall, Diana Ross and Naomi Campbell into goddesses. Mugler’s photography transports us to futuristic realms with grandiose architecture, where women glow with unparalleled sensuality. As a director, he has worked with, amongst others, Cirque du Soleil and George Michael. As a costume designer, Mugler has collaborated with countless productions, from French ballets to MacBeth and most recently with American R&B superstar Beyoncé for her ‘I am Sasha Fierce’ tour. It comes as no surprise that for Thierry Mugler, a fragrance should have the personality and the power to stimulate your imagination and dreams, combining the most unexpected ingredients in indulgent doses. description: A zipped cotton hoodie is a wardrobe staple, and this Bradley piece from Barbour is perfect for any casual occasion. Pair the hoodie with jeans and trainers and you're good to go. Brand Barbour Material 100% cotton Neckline Hooded Top Type Hoodies Washing Instructions Machine washable Brand Story The Barbour story began in 1894 in the Market Place in South Shields. Today the 5th generation family-owned business remains in the region, with Barbour’s headquarters located in Simonside, South Shields. Although it sources products from around the globe, Barbour's classic wax jacket is still manufactured by hand in the factory in Simonside with over 100,000 jackets processed via the central, subsidiary and local customer service operations each year. Today, Barbour remains true to its core values as a family business which espouses the unique values of the British countryside and brings the qualities of wit, grit and glamour to its beautifully functional clothing.

title: Julia Gash - Rome Unframed Print with Mount, 30 x 40cm
description: Perfect for kitchens, bedrooms and offices, this fun illustrated map of Rome by artist Julia Gash brings a splash of Italian pizzazz to a room. This picture is a digital print on paper and card and comes with its own wall mount. Julia Gash is a Sheffield-based artist with a great love and understanding of print. Julia developed her craft and expertise in printmaking from childhood, when she helped at her father’s print and signwriting business in Nottingham. Julia’s qualifications include a BA in Visual Communications and a Post Graduate Diploma in Printmaking from Central St. Martins. She is founder and CEO of BIDBI (Bag It Don’t Bin It) and Chief Designer for Talented, an ethically-focused and sustainable fashion accessories brand which collaborates with emerging designers on a seasonal rotation. Julia’s passions are art and travel and her cityscapes fuse these two loves as they depict places around the world seen through her eyes. A cyclist with a hat can be found in all of her prints - this little man symbolises Julia, travelling around the world through her drawings. Have you thought about hooks and fittings? Shop here . title: Clarks Stomp Roll Leather Shoes, Brown/Navy
description: Clarks Stomp Roll leather shoes are roaring fun, with adoring comfort. The light dinosaur stitching on the lace gives a slick contrast to the rest of the shoe, while the rip-tape strap delivers extra security in the fit. The sturdy rubber sole ensures your young one's feet stay cushy and comfortable. This pair also uses nifty Agion tech to suppress bacteria and odour. Measure and Fit at Home Choosing the right shoes is important for growing feet. Clarks now offer a choice of ways to measure your child’s feet, both in store and at home, so that you can be confident of finding the right fit. Clarks’ specially developed home measuring and fitting gauges allow you to conveniently measure your child’s feet at home. Once you have length and width measurements, you can quickly find your child’s correct shoe size by entering them into the Clarks' Calculator . The size indicated should be used as a guide and the fit of shoes purchased online should always be doubled checked. If you need further assistance, please visit your nearest store to have your child’s feet measured by trained partners who will find the best fit from our range of sizes and widths. title: Sunday 8th May 2pm
description:
Sunday 8th May 2pm - 4.30pm

37 Amwell Street, London, EC1R 1UR (the nearest tube station is Angel)

 

Whether you're an avid stationery fan, a bride-to-be with invitations to scribe, or you simply want to try something new, we'd love you to join us. This beginners class starts right from the beginning and focuses on modern calligraphy techniques. 

Our tutor is Megan Riera, an established modern calligrapher with a beautiful and relaxed lettering style. At the end of the session you'll be well on your way to writing your chosen phrase or quote in your own personal modern calligraphy style. You'll start by working on exercises to practice making shapes and strokes, and then move on to letter forms. By the end of the class you will have started to develop your own style with plenty of time to practice, with one-to-one help when needed.

The class cost includes a kit of calligraphy materials to use in class and take away with you, and refreshments.

PLEASE NOTE: Tickets are strictly non-refundable and non-transferable. By purchasing a ticket you agree to these terms and conditions. This does not affect your statutory rights.

This is an e-ticket, nothing will be posted - please bring with you the email confirmation to show us on your phone. The ink is waterproof and will not come out of clothes - please dress accordingly! Please refer to our FAQs for more info.

Brand Adidas Material 97% polyester, 3% elastane Sleeve Sleeveless Washing Instructions Machine washable Brand Story Adidas was started in 1920 by the German shoe designer, Adi Dassler who worked alongside his brother, Rudolf to build a successful sports footwear company. The brand’s name comes from its founder’s nickname, Adi and the first part of his surname. Wanting to create a sports company with a different direction, Rudolf later left Adidas and started Puma. Adidas have a long history of association with Olympic athletes. One of the most high profile sponsored by the brand is Jesse Owens, an American who won 4 gold medals in the 1936 Berlin Olympic Games. Today, Adidas sponsor various sporting teams, from the New Zealand All Blacks rugby team to the English cricket team. Adidas use the technology they develop for the worlds most successful sports teams to design high quality sportswear, equipment and footwear for consumers. The brand also works with designers, like Stella McCartney to make functional yet stylish sportswear, bringing innovation to the sportswear industry.

Brand Wilson Eligible for International Delivery YES Washing Instructions Machine washable at 30°C Women's Sportswear Type Socks Editor's Notes Now a global super brand, Nike started from humble beginnings in 1950s America. A college track coach named Bill Bowerman, and an athlete named Phil Knight, combined their skills and knowledge to bring innovation to the world of running shoes. One of these innovations was inspired by Bill Bowerman’s waffle iron. Bowerman realised that by creating gridded grip on the soles of their shoes, the shoe would have greater traction yet still propel the runner forward. From the start, Nike recognised the significant correlation between equipment and performance. They carry this guiding principle through all of their products, whether it's the football kit for the Brazilian national team, golfing gear for Tiger Woods or your running shoes. The brand continues to seek new and innovative ways to develop superior athletic products; this can be seen in the technology worked into improving your running experience with Nike+ products.

title: Dis Une Couleur Ice Cream Print Tee - Navy
description:
Be ready to hit the beach in this adorable bright tee.  Dis Une Couleur makes the gentlest organic cottons and this old school pop print is sure to be a hit with any little one. Love the bold colors.  It's made from the softest brushed cotton on the planet, we love it so much that we put our own precious toddlers in it.
 
ABOUT the designers 
People say all that these colors bring happiness, This is actually true, and they also tell a story! At the very first days of Baby Coco, his mother and aunts offered him very colorful, but old, clothes. When it came to introduce the baby to the posh neighborhood, his parents decided to buy new clothes with a more conventional sweet tone but uncolored to be in line with the actual fashion. Yes, Baby Coco was indeed extremely chic with his new clothes, but at the same time, he did not seem to enjoy them at all; he was missing his life in colors! This is why his mother and aunts decided to solve this disaster and created a complete set of new trendy clothes, in the good old-way, made of smooth and natural row materials, with life full colors!

description: The Sennheiser PC 333D Surround Sound PC Gaming Headset totally immerses you in your game with a closed design and effective noise blocking. 7.1 channel surround sound makes the audio even more realistic so you can forget about reality and lose yourself in your game. Superior Soundcard You'll no longer have to rely on your computer's soundcard for audio quality because the PC 333D has a USB sound adapter with an embedded Dolby system. The game audio will get a quality boost from the headset's superior soundcard instead of the computer's. Intuitive Volume Control You have more control over the audio with this headset because the volume control is located on the right earcup rather than further down the wire, so you can access it more quickly and easily. Perfect Build For Gamers Interacting with other players is easier than ever with the PC 333D. Its noise-cancelling microphone ensures other players can hear you clearly, while the easy-to-use microphone-muting function can be activate by simply raising the boom arm. Furthermore, its DJ-inspired, hinged right ear cup can be flipped up to hear other players on your team without removing the headset. Microwave and dishwasher safe this set is suitable for coffee breaks and dinner parties, and is available with yellow, green, fuchsia, light blue or orange handles, ideal to mix & match. Since its establishment in 1964, Seletti has always distinguished itself with innovative solutions in the area of household products, believing that revolution is the only solution.

title: Boori Sleigh Cotbed, Wardrobe and Dresser Furniture Set, English Oak
description: The Sleigh collection is a beautifully traditional and classic look that will bring an air of serene elegance to your nursery. This cotbed has partially enclosed ends and two base heights for ease of access and to keep baby safe. It is suitable from birth to around 3 years old. The cot then converts easily into a toddler bed by removing the side rail and adding the toddler guard which is included. This toddler bed is suitable for a child up to approximately 5 years of age. Once your child has outgrown the toddler bed, it remains functional by converting into a cosy sofa. This cotbed is delivered flat packed for home assembly. The dresser has 3 deep and fully extendable storage drawers for maximum storage and easy access. It comes with a sleigh changing station that sits on top of the dresser, or can be removed. The full size Sleigh wardrobe provides both hanging and drawer storage. In the main compartment there is a hanging rail and a shelf concealed by two doors with adjustable hinges. Below, there are two fully extendable drawers for additional storage space. Dimensions of cotbed: H104 x W80 x L157cm. Dimensions of wardrobe: H183 x W109 x D58cm. Dimensions of dresser: H88 x W108 x D49cm. Assembly Required Partial assembly Boori Collection Sleigh Brand Boori Care instructions Wipe clean Finish English Oak Manufacturer's Guarantee 5 year guarantee included Mattress Size Cotbed Mattress Size Required L132 x W70cm (sold separately) Nursery Type Nursery Furniture Suitable From Birth Featured articles Nursery Furniture Buying Guide Choose furniture and accessories for your baby's very own space Brand Story Other than the loving warmth of a parent’s embrace, nothing is more important for baby than the security and tranquility of the nursery. With over 20 years experience in the design and manufacture of nursery furniture, Boori is renowned, not only for style and practicality, but also for their concern in exceeding safety standards. Boori’s stringent commitment to optimum indoor air quality is upheld at every stage of their production and finishing processes. This commitment has been rewarded by Greenguard awarding them their highest ‘Gold’ level of accreditation for all Boori collections. To achieve Greenguard Certification means that products have been tested and certified to meet some of the world’s most stringent, third-party chemical emissions standards. This entails helping reduce indoor air pollution and the risk of chemical exposure while aiding in the creation of healthier indoor environments to improve health and quality of life. Boori continually strive to develop everything they create so that it is as flexible and as useful to your life as possible, providing added value and versatility as standard.

title: Scotch & Soda Nylon Bomber Jacket, Night
description: Opt for a contemporary look with this Nylon Bomber Jacket from Scotch & Soda. This modern bomber jacket is crafted with press stud fastenings, featuring a baseball collar and long sleeves. Pair with denim for a weekend look. Brand Scotch & Soda Fastening Press Stud Material 69% polyester, 31% nylon Pattern Plain Sleeve Length Long Sleeve Washing Instructions Machine washable Brand Story Scotch & Soda loves to make great garments that suit every individual. The brand wants people to love their clothes and enjoy wearing them. Scotch & Soda products are rich in detail, high quality and affordable. The designers at Scotch spare no effort or expense at detailing the fine-tuning samples, all the way to the neatly finished interior of each garment. The brand invest in the product, which is typically inspired by the best tried and tested classic and vintage styles, enriched with a wealth of inspiration from around the world. Though Scotch & Soda has been around since the '80s, the Amsterdam-based fashion brand as we know it today originates in a brave new start in 2001, when three new owners joined their broad experience and shared love for making great garments. After Scotch & Soda was re-launched for Spring Summer 2002, years after the brand launched a children’s collection and soon after that, an exclusive line for women. Scotch's youngest and most ambitious project, Amsterdams Blauw, hit stores in 2010; a compact high profile denim collection that could only come from the Scotch kithcen. Scotch & Soda is classic in many ways, but young and fast-forward when it comes to bringing great clothes onto the market place.

title: Rabbit Wall Border
description:
These little patterned rabbits sit in a row to form a contemporary wall border which looks lovely when placed above a cot or bed.

The rabbits come in a range of floral and polkadot patterns in shades of dusty pink and warm grey.

The set contains 18 rabbits which range in height from 7cm to 10cm. Once applied the border measures approximately 180cm but size is dependent on final placement of rabbits.

The stickers are easily applied - just peel and stick - and while most wall stickers are made of vinyl, ours are made of fabric adhesive so they can be removed, repositioned and reapplied over and over.

The fabric is a combination of cotton, polyester and paper that is 100% biodegradable. It is free from vinyl, PVC, BPA and phthalates so is a great choice for nurseries and kids' rooms. The stickers are very thin with a matt finish and a slight fabric texture. Can be wiped clean if necessary.

This design is also available as: rabbit wall stickers

title: PiP Studio Royal Sugar Bowl
description: This striking sugar bowl features a decorative mis-match effect pattern, which draws on heritage prints and presents them in a fresh, contemporary context. Brand PiP Studio Dimensions H11 x Dia.13cm Dishwasher Safe NO Material Porcelain Microwave Safe NO About PiP Studio Established in Amsterdam in 2009, PiP's style has a warm and almost intimate touchy-feely character. PiP use a mix and match concept with layered patterns focusing on tiny details and special finishing touches combined with a subtle colour pallet. With a brand moto of "Happy Products for Happy People" PiP Studio has quickly grown into a global brand offering something unique and value for money to your home. Choose the perfect china All our china is made from clay and kiln-fired for durability. Except for pieces with special trims, everything is dishwasher safe. Below are a few options to consider when choosing your perfect china. Earthenware Strong and practical, perfect for everyday. Its cream colour and low firing temperatures allow for designed pieces. Stoneware Tougher than earthenware and chip resistant. Ideal for heavy use and can often go into the oven to temperatures of up to 250°C. Terracotta Uses a clay with a rich body colour giving the characteristic base colour, and has a low glaze firing allowing bright coloured glazes. Porous body allows for good thermal expansion and contraction properties making it an ideal body for cookware such as tagines and roasters. Porcelain Delicate yet strong. Carefully selected clays give whiteness and translucency. It can often go from oven to table. Fine china The synthetic bone ash used in fine china makes it a more affordable alternative to bone china whilst maintaining the benefits - strength, translucency & delicacy. Bone china Bone china is made from 40% bone ash. This makes strong yet thin and delicate pieces which are microwave, dishwasher* and oven safe making each piece ideal for everyday use, not just formal. * Unless product has metallic details - always check individual item for specific care instructions

title: AMANI: M
description:
This natural and yellow basket design is handwoven by a member of the womens' weaving cooperatives of rural Coastal Region, Kenya.

Woven from the sisal plant, each basket goes through a detailed process, from growing, to harvesting, rolling, dyeing and finally weaving. Ideal for use as a stylish storage basket, bringing a splash of colour to your home. For more basket inspiration, see our uses page HERE.

Buying this basket directly supports the weavers to increase their livelihoods and become less dependent on self-sufficiency farming, which is very unreliable during the dry seasons. Each basket comes with a thank you card from the cooperative who made your basket. Meet the weavers from this region HERE.

A minimum of 60 micron silver is used in every Robbe & Berking plated utensil, (the average being between 20-30 microns) placing this fabulous cutlery far above competition. A comprehensive range of Martelé cutlery is available individually, along with more stunning silverware designs from Robbe & Berking.
Each piece of coveted Robbe & Berking silverware is created using traditional silversmith techniques honed by master craftsmen over the centuries, which guarantees superior quality at every step. Fashioned from the finest silver & silver plate, all of their luxurious products exhibit a brilliant shine and no matter which classic or contemporary style chosen, every range is certain to add unparalleled sophistication to any setting.

title: Cable Knit Porcelain Bowl
description:
Knitting has enjoyed something of a resurgence in recent years, with the traditional blue rinse trademark being supplanted by a new generation of domestically minded individuals. But why restrict the satisfying textures of a knitted garment to textiles only? It's the 21st Century after all! Juxtaposing what at first seems like an irreconcilable set of influences, the Brooklyn based designer has created an interdisciplinary joy - with these tactile ceramic bowls featuring an unglazed cable knitted outer texture which has a rough and genuine feel. 

With cable knit currently the darling of the fashion world, the bowls also ensure you are keeping abreast of sartorial advancements without having to spend hours scouring the high street for something in your size. Glazed inside for a contrasting smooth and glossy surface, the bowls are a delightfully unique twist on an everyday item which is ideal for salads, pasta or cereal. Or anything else you put in a bowl. Wooly!

title: Rowan Brushed Fleece by Martin Storey Knitting Pattern Book
description: Beautifully soft and featherweight this classic collection features knits for both men and women, all knitted in Rowan's new Brushed Fleece yarn. Author Martin Storey Brand Rowan Featured articles Knitting Buying Guide Everything you need to know about knitting Video: How to knit Gaye teaches you how to cast on, knit, purl and cast off with this beginners guide to knitting a simple scarf Brand Story Rowan is an internationally renowned design-led luxury handknit yarn company, producing two pattern collections a year to support a portfolio of premium yarns. Rowan was first established in 1978 by, Stephen Sheard and Simon Cockin of Yorkshire, their aim was to develop colourful rug weaving yarns which evolved into focusing on handknit yarns. Today, Rowan pride themselves on being an ethically conscious brand, with an emphasis on creating luxury, premium yarns sourced from organic, natural fibres.

title: V&A - Shoes Book
description:
Engaging with the cultural significance of footwear this Shoes: Pleasure and Pain book from V&A and edited by Helen Persson explores both men and women’s shoes throughout the history of shoes. From masterpieces by unknown craftsman, to celebrated designer creations and filled with stunning photographs, this is a great addition to your coffee table. Shoes are powerful indicators of gender, status, taste and identity and this book explores all, with contributors from a wide range of disciplines and features a comprehensive discussion of shoe design history, case studies, how they are made and the people who buy them. From the Chinese lotus shoe to the contemporary shoes-as-sculptures, this is a fabulous gift idea for the footwear fanatic.

Key features:
 * Hardback book

 * 176 pages
 * Shoes Pleasure and Pain, edited by Helen Persson
 * Authoritative guide to the history and culture of footwear

title: Garmin Fenix 3 GPS Multisport Watch, Grey
description: Hit your workout and launch yourself into the great outdoors equipped with Garmin’s Fenix 3 GPS Multisport Watch. Built to last, it’s designed with a range of features and innovations so you can measure your performance and have the information that you need to improve and progress. The Fenix 3 features an array of advanced sensors, GPS/GLONASS positioning via the steel EXO™ antenna and a 3.1cm colour Chroma display. This watch works across a range of sports and activities with functions including Running Dynamics, VO2 max estimation, swim metrics, new trail running features and extensive navigation available to you. Rugged and durable, you can depend on the Fenix 3 to withstand the rigours of vigorous use. As well as boasting an ultra-high quality build, it has a modern, stylish appearance for all day use while ensuring a comfortable fit. The Fenix 3 is smart as well. It features LiveTrack, Smart Notifications and Connect IQ™ Apps. The rechargeable 300 mAh lithium-ion battery has a battery life of up to 16 hours in GPS mode and up to 6 weeks in watch mode. Features: Stainless Steel EXO™ antenna with GPS + GLONASS positioning system Outdoor navigation features: 3-axis compass, altimeter and barometer, TracBack and Sight’n Go Advanced fitness training features including VO2 Max and Recovery Advisor with optional HRM Smart Notifications and Connect IQ™ App support Garmin Connect compatible Brand Garmin Dimensions 51 x 51 x 16 mm Face Shape Round Model name / number 010-01338-01 Strap Colour Black Strap Material Plastic or resin Strap Style Band Watch type Fitness Water Resistant 10ATM/100M

title: La Hacienda Romana Wood-Fired Oven
description: The classic style of La Hacienda's Romana wood-fired oven offers the perfect way to create artisan-style pizza to serve up in your garden. The Romana utilises heat from the pizza stone and from circulating air to bake professional-looking pizzas in minutes: simply create a fire in the lower oven compartment and cook your pizzas on the internal cordeorite pizza stone. The Romana features a firebrick base which retains heat and radiates it evenly for delicious results every time. The Romana is best used as an oven or smoker: once the oven has come up to temperature its insulated double skin construction and firebrick base holds the heat for hours allowing for perfect slow roasting and smoking. Alternatively, open the vents and load with fuel to create heat for rapid pizzas and faster cooking. Please note: Not all of our ranges are on display in our furniture departments. description: Give your teeth the most intense clean possible and help improve your overall health with the Philips Sonicare HX8012/33 AirFloss Interdental Electric Flosser Nozzles. AirFloss utilises unique air and micro-droplet technology to send a burst of pressurised air and water or mouthwash between your teeth. The one-touch activation button is as simple as a mouse click. The slim angled nozzle and guidance tip make finding the correct placement easy. Just slide along the tooth's surface near the gum line until the tip fits into the groove between the teeth. Replace nozzles every 6 months for your most effective clean between your teeth. The Sonicare AirFloss helps to clean up to 5 x more plaque between teeth than manual tooth brushing alone. Comes with 2 separate nozzles. Brand Philips

title: Adidas Adizero Cushioned Ankle Socks, Pack of 2, White/Black
description: Ideal for runners, these Adizero ankle socks from adidas are designed in an anatomical fit that reduces hot spots, with built-in arch support, a cushioned toe and mesh areas for increased airflow. Fashioned with flat toe seams to reduce friction and ensure comfort as you hit the road, they are left and right specific and sport reflective details for visibility in low light conditions. Brand Adidas Material 52% nylon, 45% polypropylene, 2% elastane, 1% other Washing Instructions Machine washable Brand Story Adidas was started in 1920 by the German shoe designer, Adi Dassler who worked alongside his brother, Rudolf to build a successful sports footwear company. The brand’s name comes from its founder’s nickname, Adi and the first part of his surname. Wanting to create a sports company with a different direction, Rudolf later left Adidas and started Puma. Adidas have a long history of association with Olympic athletes. One of the most high profile sponsored by the brand is Jesse Owens, an American who won 4 gold medals in the 1936 Berlin Olympic Games. Today, Adidas sponsor various sporting teams, from the New Zealand All Blacks rugby team to the English cricket team. Adidas use the technology they develop for the worlds most successful sports teams to design high quality sportswear, equipment and footwear for consumers. The brand also works with designers, like Stella McCartney to make functional yet stylish sportswear, bringing innovation to the sportswear industry.

title: Briggs & Riley Baseline Carry-On Expandable 2-Wheel 53.3cm Cabin Suitcase
description: The Briggs & Riley’s newest Baseline range includes this expandable carry-on suitcase. It’s designed with a CX expansion-compression system to increase packing capacity by 34%, then compresses back to original size for easy overhead storage. The frame of the case is made from lightweight hybrid fiberglass which provides flexibility, durability and shape retention. The main compartment features a built-in, tri-fold garment folder for 1-2 suits and a foam roll bar to prevent wrinkling, as well as a cinch-down mesh garment panels to prevent your clothing from shifting. The telescopic handle is fitted on the outside of the case to ensure you have maximum packing space and allows you to flat pack to minimise wrinkles. This suitcase also has a large u-zip pocket on the front for last-minute extras, a TSA padlock for hassle-free travel to the USA (as it allows airport security to check the contents of your case without damaging it) and a hidden ID tag. The case also comes with a tethered Smartlink strap to let you transport 2 or more bags as 1. The padded top handle ensures comfortable lifting, while the reinforced, low-profile protective corner guards on all 4 corners provide added strength. Includes a Lifetime Performance Guarantee that even covers airline damage. Make your journey more pleasant with the right travel accessories. description: Lightweight and loaded with a speedy processor, 8-megapixel camera and reliable battery, Lenovo’s Yoga 3 tablet with 8-inch touchscreen lets you easily enjoy your entertainment when you’re on the go, watch DYI videos when you’re decorating your new home and capture your special holiday moments. Qualcomm Snapdragon 212 APQ8009 processor Snapdragon 212 supports 1080p Full HD video playback and capture as well as 3D gaming for immersive entertainment at its best. title: Terrarium Design School
description:
Learn to design, plant and sustain a divine terrarium. You’ll leave having made your very own miniature, low-maintenance and on-trend biosphere.

During the class you’ll learn how to create your own easy-to-keep but beautiful indoor garden. Master the art of wiggling little plants through thin bottlenecks (think cacti, succulents, orchids and tropicals) and making them snug with charcoal, stones and soil.

As well as being given all the materials you need to create your own terrarium, you’ll learn how to make the tools to work with difficult bottle shapes (ever tried squeezing a cactus into a bottle?) and how to choose plants which thrive in their own microclimate. At the end of the day, you’ll leave merrily clutching your own unique work of art.

WHAT YOU NEED TO KNOW.

Everything you need – glass containers, plants, soil and accessories – will be provided on the day. You’re more than welcome to bring your own container, if you have something special planned.

Each session lasts 2.5 hours and caters for 5-10 people.

WHERE.

Shoreditch, London.

WHEN.

Sessions take place once every two months (on Tuesdays or Saturdays). Simply call The Indytute via the number on the right to find out about upcoming dates or look on our website.

title: Adidas Performance Gym Tote Bag, Black
description: Make life easier as you travel about with the adidas Performance Gym Tote Bag. This item offers plenty of space to fit all your sports gear in as you make your way between home, work and the gym. Brand Adidas Brand Story Adidas was started in 1920 by the German shoe designer, Adi Dassler who worked alongside his brother, Rudolf to build a successful sports footwear company. The brand’s name comes from its founder’s nickname, Adi and the first part of his surname. Wanting to create a sports company with a different direction, Rudolf later left Adidas and started Puma. Adidas have a long history of association with Olympic athletes. One of the most high profile sponsored by the brand is Jesse Owens, an American who won 4 gold medals in the 1936 Berlin Olympic Games. Today, Adidas sponsor various sporting teams, from the New Zealand All Blacks rugby team to the English cricket team. Adidas use the technology they develop for the worlds most successful sports teams to design high quality sportswear, equipment and footwear for consumers. The brand also works with designers, like Stella McCartney to make functional yet stylish sportswear, bringing innovation to the sportswear industry.

Each piece in this collection features a long slim handle stem with an intricate filigree rose design on the base, turning every item into a masterpiece. A minimum of 60 micron silver is used in every Robbe & Berking plated utensil, (the average being between 20-30 microns) placing this fabulous cutlery far above competition. A comprehensive range of Rosenmuster cutlery is available individually, along with more stunning silverware designs from Robbe & Berking.
Each piece of coveted Robbe & Berking silverware is created using traditional silversmith techniques honed by master craftsmen over the centuries, which guarantees superior quality at every step. Fashioned from the finest silver & silver plate, all of their luxurious products exhibit a brilliant shine and no matter which classic or contemporary style chosen, every range is certain to add unparalleled sophistication to any setting.

The pattern incorporates bold, colourful blooms and pretty butterfly detailing and will instantly brighten up table settings, be they formal or everyday. Brand PiP Studio Country of Origin China Dimensions Dia.23cm Dishwasher Safe Not dishwasher safe Gifts by Interest Gifts for Afternoon Tea Material Porcelain Microwave Safe Not suitable for microwave use About PiP Studio Established in Amsterdam in 2009, PiP's style has a warm and almost intimate touchy-feely character. PiP use a mix and match concept with layered patterns focusing on tiny details and special finishing touches combined with a subtle colour pallet. With a brand moto of "Happy Products for Happy People" PiP Studio has quickly grown into a global brand offering something unique and value for money to your home. Choose the perfect china All our china is made from clay and kiln-fired for durability. Except for pieces with special trims, everything is dishwasher safe. Below are a few options to consider when choosing your perfect china. Earthenware Strong and practical, perfect for everyday. Its cream colour and low firing temperatures allow for designed pieces. Stoneware Tougher than earthenware and chip resistant. Ideal for heavy use and can often go into the oven to temperatures of up to 250°C. Terracotta Uses a clay with a rich body colour giving the characteristic base colour, and has a low glaze firing allowing bright coloured glazes. Porous body allows for good thermal expansion and contraction properties making it an ideal body for cookware such as tagines and roasters. Porcelain Delicate yet strong. Carefully selected clays give whiteness and translucency. It can often go from oven to table. Fine china The synthetic bone ash used in fine china makes it a more affordable alternative to bone china whilst maintaining the benefits - strength, translucency & delicacy. Bone china Bone china is made from 40% bone ash. This makes strong yet thin and delicate pieces which are microwave, dishwasher* and oven safe making each piece ideal for everyday use, not just formal. * Unless product has metallic details - always check individual item for specific care instructions

title: Pull Along Toy - Smiley the Cow
description:
Allow me to introduce Smiley, The Pull Along Cow by Djeco. She's a grand old cow, a real stunner. This is a gorgeous pull along toy that encourages babies to get on their feet and explore the world, trailing Smily behind. This wooden toy is painted by hand and finished to perfection. The daisy in her mouth and the hat on her head wobble as she rolls along. She's even got her on decal, the letter S, on her wheels! A wonderful newborn gift to be treasured for generations.

Suitable for children newborn-100 years old! 

ABOUT the brand

Djeco is one of our all time favourite brands, our life as children would have been enhanced 100 fold had we laid our paws on their art kits. For any child who likes to colour and make things, Djeco has a gorgeous array of activities, from puzzles to gel pastels to clay modeling. The supplies are top quality, the presentation gorgeous and the instructions clear and easy. 

What really stands out though is the games and creatures they invent. Their use of colour and design is stellar. Their mobiles are a MUST see. They employ some of the world's top artists and illustrators. Even crediting them on the box. When have you ever heard of a designer getting a credit for their art?

Their love for craft, childhood and beautiful things shines through and makes this brand really singular.

We highly recommend a visit to their award-winning website, it's so imaginative, full of music and games for kids.

title: Silver Cross PostureStart Care & Protect Plus Cotbed Mattress
description: The Silver Cross PostureStart Care & Protect Plus cot mattress is expertly handmade in Yorkshire to provide a premium protective sleeping environment for your baby. The mattress incorporates 2580 BabySprings® to adapt to the contours of your baby's shape as they grow, providing unrivalled comfort and unsurpassed postural support. Each layer of the triple-spring system has been centrally zoned to increase the level of support to the hips and lower lumber, where body weight is greater. The BabySprings are breathable and help move airflow around the core of the mattress, helping to keep the internal mattress fillings fresh. The natural Talalay latex fillings are breathable and durable, retaining their shape and elasticity over time. Latex is the ideal cot mattress filling, providing targeted support while allowing air to circulate. The PostureStart Care & Protect Plus model also includes the revolutionary SleepAngel® filter technology and a supremely breathable SilverFlo removable cover, ensuring the safest sleep environment for your child. Optimise baby's sleep by partnering your purchase with a mattress protector from our comprehensive range. Brand Silver Cross Care instructions Removable covers are machine washable at 60ºC. Depth Mattress 10cm Dimensions L140 x W70 x D10cm Mattress care Information ‘No turn’ indicates that the mattress should not be turned over or flipped. ‘Rotate regularly’ indicates that the mattress should be rotated from head to toe, but not turned over or flipped. Turn regularly Mattress Size Cotbed Mattress tension Medium to Firm Mattress Type Pocket Spring Mattress Type Pocket Spring Spring count 2580 Featured articles Nursery mattresses buying guide Advice on choosing a mattress for your new arrival Brand Story Founded in 1877, Silver Cross is one of the oldest nursery brands in the world, famous for its collection of contemporary, stylish prams and pushchairs offering modern parents the best start in life for their babies. In addition to the latest travel systems including Surf and Wayfarer, Silver Cross is also famous for its handmade, classic prams. The iconic Balmoral is still made to the highest standards here in the UK. Offering infant car seats and lightweight strollers, Silver Cross provides families with the perfect system to suit their lifestyles. As well as baby travel, Silver Cross is also well known for its collections of high quality nursery furniture, nursery bedding, toys and gifts.

Growing up in Lincoln, she graduated from Leeds University in 1994 with a first class honours degree in Graphic Art and Design. She then moved to London, working for an agency illustrating for books, magazines and labels. In 1996, she took her work to Country Living Fair, where they were a sell out success, exhibiting every year since. In 2007 she founded her company with her brother Jem's help, adorning products with her popular chicken, stag and dog designs.

title: Scotch & Soda Ralston Slim Jeans, Summer Spirit
description: Boost your denim staples with Scotch & Soda's Ralston jeans, an essential for any modern man's wardrobe. Designed to neatly hug in on the waist and seat, continuing downwards with a slim-line leg with knee measuring 41cm and hem of 36cm. They have 5 pockets, two pockets on the front with a mini pocket in the right hand one, and two pockets on the rear, and a button fly. Add a leather belt to your new pair of jeans Brand Scotch & Soda Denim Wash Mid Jeans Fit Slim Material 100% cotton Washing Instructions Machine washable Featured articles Men's Jeans Buying Guide Take a look at our guide to work out which style will suit you best Brand Story Scotch & Soda loves to make great garments that suit every individual. The brand wants people to love their clothes and enjoy wearing them. Scotch & Soda products are rich in detail, high quality and affordable. The designers at Scotch spare no effort or expense at detailing the fine-tuning samples, all the way to the neatly finished interior of each garment. The brand invest in the product, which is typically inspired by the best tried and tested classic and vintage styles, enriched with a wealth of inspiration from around the world. Though Scotch & Soda has been around since the '80s, the Amsterdam-based fashion brand as we know it today originates in a brave new start in 2001, when three new owners joined their broad experience and shared love for making great garments. After Scotch & Soda was re-launched for Spring Summer 2002, years after the brand launched a children’s collection and soon after that, an exclusive line for women. Scotch's youngest and most ambitious project, Amsterdams Blauw, hit stores in 2010; a compact high profile denim collection that could only come from the Scotch kithcen. Scotch & Soda is classic in many ways, but young and fast-forward when it comes to bringing great clothes onto the market place.

title: Robbe & Berking - Avenue Fish Knife
description:
Add decadent vintage design to your dining settings with this Avenue fish knife from Robbe & Berking. This opulent range is plated with the finest quality 150g massive plate silver, signified by the small mammoth hallmark next to the signature R&B. Each piece in this collection features a slightly flared handle with small ridges that beautifully display the contrast between light & shadow. A minimum of 60 micron silver is used in every Robbe & Berking plated utensil, (the average being between 20-30 microns) placing this fabulous cutlery far above competition. A comprehensive range of Avenue cutlery is available individually, along with more stunning silverware designs from Robbe & Berking.
Each piece of coveted Robbe & Berking silverware is created using traditional silversmith techniques honed by master craftsmen over the centuries, which guarantees superior quality at every step. Fashioned from the finest silver & silver plate, all of their luxurious products exhibit a brilliant shine and no matter which classic or contemporary style chosen, every range is certain to add unparalleled sophistication to any setting.

title: Black Makeup Bag with Phone Charger
description:
Other Colours

Adaptor Kit for iPhone Users

Standard UK Delivery £3.65

Free UK Delivery on Orders Over £50

Usually Dispatched Within 24 Hours

Next Day Delivery Available

International Delivery Calculated at Checkout

Being without a phone is something no one should have to experience in the 21st century. Unfortunately for many people around the globe, we know the situation all too well. You have a phone, it’s needed to help get through the daily tasks and yet, somehow, we always find a way to let that battery get low. It seems to happen out of the blue, doesn’t it? As if our phones know the time isn’t right - they seem to die quicker.

If this sounds like you or someone you know, it may be time to try something different. You always bring a makeup bag with you, right? Whether solely for the purpose of I.D. and cosmetic storage or to bring anything and everything you may need on an unexpected adventure. Why inconvenience yourself with yet another thing to worry about and rely on a charger in your car or one that has to be remembered in order to get packed? With the black Jadeco purse with charger, a dying battery will be a thing of the past. Most micro USB and Apple devices can be charged from anywhere your heart decides to travel. Keeping in touch just got a whole lot easier!

  • Black makeup bag with phone charger
  • 3000mAh Li-polymer battery
  • Charge time of approx. 5 hours
  • 1.5A rated output
  • Measures 193mm wide by 140mm high and 63mm deep
  • Retains charge for up to six months when not in use

title: BOX APPETIT ocean
description:
THE 1ST DESIGNER LUNCH BOX

They say food tastes better when it is presented in a beautiful way and now there is a lunchbox that does just that. Children shouldn’t be the only ones to get cool lunch boxes.



FUNCTIONALITY

The ‘glass like’ lid locks to the body for a water tight seal and has an ingenious sauce dipping area (good for sushi lovers). A sauce pot is ideal for salad dressing (or ketchup), so you can dress your salad just before you eat it. An inner dish allows you to split different foods so you can microwave a hot dish, but keep other foods cold. We have also included a fork which has a cutting edge down one side and this makes one handed eating easy (we call it a 'fife' because it is a fork + knife in one).



A WORD FROM THE DESIGNER

The initial interest in lunch boxes, came from taking lunch to work. Martin Blum’s wife is Japanese. He would come to work with a traditional bento box, that was beautifully designed and presented the Japanese food inside in a much more desirable way than standard food containers. Looking at lunch boxes in the western market, we realised that children had the option of fun lunch boxes, but for adults, there was very little on the market. This inspired us to redesign the lunchbox and was the starting point for the whole box appetit range.

title: KUBWA: M
description:
This black and pink laundry basket design is handwoven by a member of the womens' weaving cooperatives in rural Eastern Region, Kenya. 

Woven from the sisal plant, each basket goes through a detailed process, from growing, to harvesting, rolling, dyeing and finally weaving. Ideal for use as a stylish storage basket, log or laundry basket, bringing a splash of colour to your home. For more basket inspiration, see our uses page HERE. 

Buying this basket directly supports the weavers to increase their livelihoods and become less dependent on self-sufficiency farming, which is very unreliable during the dry seasons. 

 

Material:  SISAL & LEATHER

Dimensions: 45cm H x 45cm DIA

Leather used is a by-product of the food industry.

 

FAIR TRADE & HANDMADE IN KENYA

title: Lily-Flame Springtime Glass Candle Jar
description: Fragrant and bursting with promise, spring is one of the most glorious times of the year. Its abundant bouquet is celebrated by Lily-Flame in the form of this wonderful candle scent. With a combination of seasonal flowers including lilac, crocuses, hyacinths and tulips, it simply blooms with the sweet, fresh aura of springtime. The candle comes in a handsome glass jar, and lasts for around 50 hours. Lily-Flame started life with the help of a loan from the Prince's Trust. The company quickly outgrew its industrial unit in North London and is now based in a more idyllic location - a converted cowshed in Glastonbury, Somerset. The homemade range of candles in tins continues to grow. Many days go into selecting the best possible fragrance for each one. Expert 'noses' carry out blind tests for authenticity and 'throw', the ability of the candle to fill a room with scent. title: JOHN LEWIS & Co. Jaspe Cotton Full Zip Hoodie, Grey
description: Crafted from soft cotton in a traditional jaspe weave for a distinctive melange effect, this JOHN LEWIS & Co. hoodie is sure to become a casual favourite. Complete with a full zip front adorned with a leather effect zip pull, it features a drawstring hood and twin kangaroo pockets. Effortlessly versatile, layer it over a T-shirt and jeans to complete an easy-going off-duty look. Brand JOHN LEWIS & Co. Material 100% cotton Neckline Hooded Top Type Hoodies Washing Instructions Machine washable Brand Story John Lewis first opened its doors in 1864 on Oxford Street and began an enduring commitment to design and create products of high quality yet good value. JOHN LEWIS & Co. celebrates and draws inspiration from our proud heritage to create an authentic menswear collection. The design of the range is heavily influenced by the John Lewis archive, which holds our history in photos, fabrics and papers. Drawing on traditional craftsmanship, the JOHN LEWIS & Co. range galvanises the old idea that clothes are built to last. All of the garments are made using British fabrics and manufacturers where possible, often making use of long-established techniques. Meticulous attention to detail in the clothing shines through in the stunning fabrics and exquisite trims. While the look of the products echoes the quality of Great British heritage, JOHN LEWIS & Co. is also a very contemporary collection. The designs are aligned with this season’s menswear trends, allowing you to create fashionable, authentic looks that have the timeless appeal of premium quality and beautiful craftsmanship.

title: A Possum's Tail Book
description:
ABOUT the product

A quintessentially British book about London-- Little Samuel Drew and his pull along dog are on a mission to cross London and visit the possums at the London Zoo. Disappointed that the possums are asleep, Samuel turns around and heads back through the crowded streets of London. Unknowingly the possums are now following him! We won't tell you the ending but there is a picnic involved and flying balloons. Luckily it all ends well in this colourful and charming story. Told in rhyming verse, it's a fun book to read.

"A Possum’s Tail is a humourous caper that beautifully illustrates the richness of cosmopolitan London" Tate Publishing.

Gabby Dawnay is a writer and artist whose work includes script-writing children’s television series for the BBC, and PR and marketing for the increasingly popular children’s magazine Okido.

Alex Barrow is a London-based illustrator. Alex is a regular contributor and creative producer for Okido children’s magazine. This is his first book for children. 

Published in 2014. 22 pages.

Measures 22.8cm (9 inches) x 29cm (11.4 inches)

ABOUT the designer

Tom Schamp is an award winning Belgian illustrator whose very distinctive style of work his highly sought after internationally.  This is his first book published in English although he has previously published 20 children's books and worked on album covers, calenders, posters, stamps, toys, newspapers and magazines.

Part of this Art powerhouse is TATE Publishing, considered by one of the world’s leading publishers on the visual arts. They aim to bring the best new writing on art and the highest quality reproductions to the widest possible range of readers.

title: Alessi Pinch Stainless Steel Vase
description:
Free UK Delivery

Usually Dispatched Within 24 Hours

Next Day Delivery Available

International Delivery Calculated at Checkout

A stunning, modern mirror polished stainless steel vase from Italian brand Alessi. The pinch vase was inspired by the transformation of an industrial object into a useful elegant product. The designer used a square tube, first cut, then closed at one end with a welded base then flattened at the other end, to obtain a narrow, wide mouth. The bottom is shaped with four semi-spherical depressions that ensure good stability when resting. The opening of the vase is long and narrow which allows for beautiful flower arrangements but could also be used for just one flower with the stem positioned in the middle.

  • Material: 18/10 mirror polished stainless steel
  • Dimensions: 23 x 7.6 x 12.5 cm
  • Designed by Adam Shirley

Brand Ted Baker Fastening Button Fit Regular Material 80% wool, 20% polyester Pattern Plain Washing Instructions Dry clean only Brand Story Beginning as a men’s label in Glasgow in 1987, Ted Baker quickly gained a reputation for providing unique, contemporary men’s shirting, paying attention to the smallest details, offering the highest quality products, and always with a quirky sense of humour. The first store even offered a free laundry service for every shirt sold. Today Ted Baker is an International brand, offering everything from Footwear ranges to Fragrances, Womenswear and Eyewear. The focus is always on quality, on unique detail both underpinned by a very distinctive, fun personality. Choosing not to have advertising of any sort, Ted Baker rely solely on word of mouth and inventive marketing ideas to drive their success, remaining one of the only brands to be built into an international designer label without an advertising campaign. title: Nikon D5500 Digital SLR Camera with 18-105mm VR Lens, HD 1080p, 24MP, Wi-Fi, 3" Touch LCD Display, Black
description: The Nikon D5500 is a powerhouse product with intuitive control, feature-rich design and spell-binding quality. You’ll create staggering snaps with the 24.2 megapixels, sky-high ISO and 5fps shooting speed, then be inspired by the range of photo filters, effect and modes. At the flick of a switch, this D-SLR turns into a Full HD video camera so you can create anything from fast-moving events to serene slow-mo scenes with the rapid 60p frame rate. Using the in-built Wi-Fi, you can then share it with a smartphone or tablet so your masterpiece can be accessed immediately. The swivelling touch display makes navigation simple, smart and instinctive. Staggering Performance This camera and included AF-S DX NIKKOR VR 18-105mm lens will help harness your creativity with their super-sharp resolution, lucid light sensitivity and seamless action. The 24.2 megapixels give eye-popping clarity, while the 25,600 ISO ensures an outstanding grasp of low-light scenes. Its sensor has no optical low-pass filter, freeing it to capture the outstanding details delivered by the NIKKOR lens. On top of that, this lens has a Vibration Reduction (VR) image stabiliser for steadier, more defined shots. Its Silent Wave Motor gives lightning-quick autofocus that’s smooth, accurate and nearly silent, while the 5.8x zoom gives razor-sharp close-ups. Bespoke Photography You’ll see this camera as a blank canvas for any artistic endeavour you could imagine. The lens’s aperture ranges from f/3.5 to f/22, so you’ll get stunning snaps in any setting from intimate portraitures with clear subject/background separation to sweeping landscapes. Using the 3.2” Vari-Angle LCD display, you can re-touch your creations and customise them with filters and effects. You can shoot star-trail images, interval-timer sequences and enhance colour with the HDR mode. Photography should have no restraints, and this camera is no exception. Built-In Wi-Fi – Create & Share Using Nikon’s snapbridge technology, the D5500 automatically transfers your work to a compatible smartphone or tablet. You can then text, e-mail or post it online wherever you are, without the need for a hot spot. On top of that, you can even pair your device with the camera and use it as an external monitor and remote. Such innovation will add a new dimension to your photography. Touch-Screen Vari-Angle Display The large swivelling touch screen is one of Nikon’s exciting new features. Once you flip out the 3.2 inch display, you can more easily handle awkward angles and even stumble upon new ones. During playback, you can pinch to zoom and swipe to cycle through pictures, just like a smartphone. The new Fn button gives you one-touch access to important settings like aperture and ISO sensitivity, while the simple navigation will make using this camera fun and familiar. Grab ‘n’ Go Compact Design Its small, lightweight design make it easy to carry around, while the monocoque structure is reinforced with long-fibre thermoplastics for hardy durability. With its deep grip and ergonomic design, this camera is comfortable to use and perfect for trips. Key Features 24.2 megapixel image sensor Compact design with swivelling Touch Screen Vari-Angle LCD Display Built-In Wi-Fi connectivity with Nikon snapbridge technology Full HD 1080/60p video recording with advanced movie features 100-25,600 ISO for stunning low-light results Includes AF-S DX NIKKOR 18-105mm Lens with 5.8x zoom, Vibration Reduction technology, Silent Wave Motor autofocus and f/3.5 – f/22 aperture range Accessories Included Rubber Eyecup DK-25, Body Cap BF-1B, Rechargeable Li-ion Battery EN-EL14a (with terminal cover), Battery Charger MH-24 (plug adapter supplied in countries or regions where required; shape depends on country of sale), Strap AN-DC3, USB Cable UC-E23, Audio Autofocus Information This feature fixes onto the main subject and enhances focus on a snap's hot spots Yes Brand Nikon Built In Flash Yes Camera Type Digital SLR Connections USB input, Audio input, Microphone input Type C HDMI connector, accessory terminal Continuous Shooting Speed Information The amount of frames per second that can be shot in continuous shooting mode 5fps Dimensions Packaged: H14 x W34.8 x D21.5cm Direct printing Information Can connect to a compatible digital camera to print without the need to use a computer. PictBridge, DPOF Display 3.2" Display Exclusive to John Lewis Yes Face Detection Information Automatically detects faces and optimises focus, so they're the main subject/s of a snap Yes File Formats NEF (RAW): 12- or 14 bit, compressed. description: Invite your friends and family to enjoy your special day with this set of wedding invitations. With gold foiled hearts showing on the insert through a cut out window, this pocket invitation is both simple yet exquisite and will set the scene for your big day. How do I personalise my product? When placing your order think about your message before confirming anything. And, remember to keep it free from rude words or potentially offensive messages, even if intended as a joke, we won't be able to print it. Once you've placed your order, CCA will contact you by phone within 1 working day of the order being placed to discuss your personalisation requirements. A proof will be prepared and sent to you for approval and then your order will take 10 working days to arrive. All personalisation will be in black ink unless otherwise stated. title: Le Creuset 3-Ply Stainless Steel Deep Casserole, 24cm
description: Le Creuset has been making world-class cookware for almost 100 years. Used by leading chefs and keen cooks around the globe, Le Creuset cookware offers outstanding performance time after time. Stylish design coupled with superb cooking results feature in the 3-ply stainless steel range from Le Creuset. Its special 3-layer construction ensures an even and efficient spread of heat throughout the entire body of each pan preventing hot spots during cooking. With lots of additional features, including helper handles and capacity markings, cooking with 3-ply stainless steel is easy and pleasurable. Not all stainless steel cookware is the same.The below explains the unique features and benefits of Le Creuset 3-ply stainless steel. The Le Creuset 3-ply stainless steel range is made using the latest multi-layering technology where stainless steel and aluminium are bonded together to form the special 3-ply material. A core of aluminium is sandwiched between 2 layers of premium grade stainless steel cleverly combining the cooking benefits of both materials. The aluminium stretches from base to rim, meaning heat spreads evenly and gently throughout the entire pan – not just the base. Suitable for use on all types of hob, including induction, the pans are also oven safe to 260°c/500°F and are dishwasher safe. Each pan is covered by a lifetime guarantee. Cooking is both easy and enjoyable with 3-ply stainless steel. Thoughtful touches include capacity markings inside Le Creuset's saucepans and casseroles and an all-round pouring rim to prevent drips and spills. The professional-style cast handles are attached with stainless steel rivets for a superior, secure fixing and the addition of helper handles* makes lifting pans even easier. * in selected products. title: Natural Incense Sticks - Ajanta
description:
• DESCRIPTION
  • ABOUT
  • REVIEWS

  • Ajanta temple grade, natural incense sticks have a wonderfully evocative scent and are known for their clearing properties.  A sensual blend of sonorous spices, herbs and aromatic barks, which evoke the spirit of ancient, mysterious temples adorned with carvings and stunning masterpieces of Buddhist art, hidden deep in the Maharashtra region of India. Ume incense can be used to create a fragrant space for meditation, yoga, relaxation and also to purify the air in the home, office or when traveling.  

    - Plant-based aromatic ingredients  
    - See our full calming incense collection
    - 30 pure incense sticks per box
    - Each box has around 15 hours worth of total burn time. 

    Cheap incense sticks are filled with some down right nasty chemicals, and no-one wants their chi affected by those bad vibes. Ume produces high-grade incense sticks made only with pure, plant-based aromatic ingredients, blended by master-craftsman.

  • The Ume brand was founded by Emma Leafe after several influential journeys – visiting temples, sacred places, and exquisite tea houses, across the alluring provinces of China. The quality incense is blended using only natural, high grade, fragrant plant material and is inspired by ancient recipes. The raw ingredients of their traditional incense consist of precious medicinal plants, herbs, spices, aromatic tree barks, seeds and saps, they are imbued with thousands of years of development.

    Ume's herbs and spices are sourced from all over the Asian continent, from the countries of South East Asia and Indonesia to Korea, China and Tibet, and the exact composition of these fragrant masterpieces, often take years to achieve. It is this love and passion they have, and look for, in the producers they collaborate with. Their clientele also insists on finest quality ethical products and such integrity is of foremost importance to them when sourcing their materials. In Buddhist and folk rituals, incense is used in prayer and to make dedicated offerings in ancestor worship. Ume represents an opportunity to explore such ancient practices, moulding them into a contemporary context.

title: Burleigh - Regal Peacock Hexagonal Bowl

Key features:

 * Design first created in 1913 for King George V

 * Expertly crafted by hand at the UK’s only Victorian pottery in Stoke on Trent
 * Decorated using the historic tissue paper technique
 * Copper plate which prints the design took over 1000 hours to engrave
 * Extensive manufacturing process carried out on each piece

title: Branch table lamp #14
description:
This 'Branch' table light has been created from wind felled wood collected in Epping Forest, East London. The English hardwood base is finished with a vintage enamel shade in bottle green, adding an industrial edge to the organic form. Every light is unique, hand-crafted in East London.

Details

Dimensions approx: 100cm high x 50cm reach.

The Branch table lights are created from sustainable sources, gathered from trees that are 'wind felled' or part of a forest management programme.

The light fittings and flex are sourced from British suppliers of the highest standards, this ethos is important to us as it reinforces the heritage of our lights. Furthermore, avoiding cheaper products from further afield greatly cuts on global emissions, resulting in a more sustainable product.

The height of each shade is easily adjustable to suit your requirements.

This light is fitted with a standard bayonet (B22) fitting, a bulb is not included.

Care

This wooden table lamp has been oiled to protect it and enhance its natural beauty.

Delivery

Due to its size this wooden table lamp requires special delivery. Within mainland UK this will be £15 per order and delivery is usually made within 7 days.

For delivery to the Scottish Highlands & Islands and all offshore locations please email us for a quote and delivery timescale.

Please click here to view our full delivery and returns information.

title: Emma Happiness Framed Book Page
description:
This happiness quote from Jane Austen's Emma is printed onto a page from the novel itself, and makes a perfect gift for book lovers.

"You must be the best judge of your own happiness."

Bibliophiles will adore this inspiring Jane Austen quote! It's uplifting and empowering, and a helpful daily reminder that we're the controllers of our own destiny. This unique quote print makes an ideal for birthday gift, or romantic gesture.

The beautiful vintage book pages are framed in sustainably sourced wood and gift wrapped in a beautiful old road map. The quotation is printed using a hand drawn font made exclusively for Bookishly, and the original book pages make each one unique.

The page is taken from a small a-format paperback and the piece measures approximately 12cm x 18cm (approx 5 inches x 7 inches). There is approx 0.3cm of black frame showing around the page, and the frame is 3cm deep.

The black wooden frames are handmade in Northamptonshire and there’s no glass so you can feel the lovely old page. The frames stand up by themselves or hang flush to the wall. They look great stood on a bookshelf. The old books come from local charity shops and second hand book dealers.

title: Coffee Toffee Chocolate
description:
What: A hand-scooped bar of noble bitter chocolate. A fine layer of caramel on almond nougat, coated in coffee chocolate. Cocoa 75% min in chocolate.  

Vital statistics: Hand scooped 70g bar.  Ingredients: raw cane sugar, cocoa butter, butter, almonds, cream, full cream milk powder, cocoa mass, glucose invert sugar syrup, sweet whey powder, milk, whole cane sugar, ground coffee beans, salt, emulsifier: soy lecithin, lemon juice concentrate, coffee powder, vanilla, rose petals, lemon powder(lemon juice concentrate & corn starch & sugar), cinnamon. 

How: Zotter are artisan chocolatiers and one of the few companies that process their own cocoa.They also proudly produce organic and fairtrade chocolate from bean to bar. Certified Fairtrade and Organic. 

Who: Josef Zotter is an Austrian chocolatier who is passionate about chocolate and creates pioneering new flavours. He works with fairtrade cocoa farmers around the world to source the best beans for your bar.
Why: Buying fairtrade chocolate provides farmers in developing countries with fair prices, fair terms, decent working conditions and empowers them to create sustainable businesses.

title: Hanging Moon Mobile - Newborn Card by Meri Meri
description:
ABOUT the PRODUCT

This beautiful handmade newborn card includes a Glittery Hanging Moon Mobile. We love how you can detach the little mobile and hang it up to celebrate the arrival of a little one. Comes with a ring that make it's easy and neat for hanging.

Envelope size: 5 x 7 inches.

ABOUT the DESIGNER

Name after founder Meredithe's nick name, Meri Meri is a gorgeously crafted line of paper goods, party and bake ware. It began in Los Angeles, 1985 with some scissors, pens and a BIG pot of glitter. Under the spell fell some local stores, Meredithe gathered more crafters, then fell some very important stores like Bergdorf Goodman in New York. Now many pots of glitter later, Meredithe can be found in Cheltenham an hour west of London. Still making cards amongst other things but this time in a studio 400 years old alongside 20 designers and artworkers.

title: Assouline - Proust Questionnaire Book
description:
Enjoy one of the most iconic and world renowned questionnaires of all time with The Proust Questionnaire from Assouline. Made famous by Marcel Proust in the late 19th century when he answered a friend’s personality questionnaire, these questions and his corresponding answers are some of the best-known interviewing devices still in use today. Containing the original questionnaire and Proust’s hand written replies, this book also holds questionnaires filled out by a range of cultural figures such as Richard Meier and Brigitte Bardot. There are also blank versions at the end of the book, making it a fabulous gift idea and perfect for entertaining.

Key features:
 * Cover: hardcover with jacket
 * Dimensions: H28xW22cm
 * Length: 96 pages
 * By William C. Carter (foreword)
 * Introduction by Henry-Jean Servat
 * Fun, intelligent & concise personality questionnaire
 * Contains Marcel Proust’s original answers, along with blank questions
 * One of the best know interview devices used in current times
 * More inspiring literature available from Assouline

description:
What: These beautiful flower earrings are handmade from bomb casings recovered from the war in Cambodia in the 1970s. Flower diameter 3.2 cm.
How: Ironworks artisans skillfully mould bomb casings into jewellery - melting down the metal, cutting it to shape and polishing it.
Who: These earrings were made by Clem and Chantha in their mini home workshops. The range is exclusively available in the UK through Eighteen Rabbit thanks to a new partnership we have developed with Craftworks Cambodia, who work with disabled and impoverished artisans affected by war, poverty and HIV/AIDS. 
Why: Buying these earrings helps to cement a new trading partnership between Britain and Cambodia benefiting people affected by war and poverty.

title: Sisley Cellulinov Intensive Anti-Cellulite Body Care, 200ml
description: An innovative and complete body care: anti-dimple, moisturizing, firming, skin perfecting. Cellulinov is an intensive anti-cellulite* body care, which targets the look of cellulite thanks to an exceptional synergy of plant-based active ingredients and essential oils, resulting from the latest advances from Sisley Research. Longan Seed, Red Algae and Indian Lotus extracts are combined with Caffeine and Cedrol to provide targeted action on the appearance of cellulite. Its creamy, velvety texture is ideal for prolonged massage. Dimples are reduced, orange peel skin is smoothed and the silhouette is reshaped. Skin is visibly more beautiful: firmer, incredibly soft, as if like new. * Refers to the appearance of cellulite Usage tips: Apply morning and evening to areas of concern and massage until the product has been fully absorbed. Use as a special treatment several times a year. Massage advice: 1. On the thighs and buttocks: use both hands to encircle the thighs and apply strong pressure from the bottom of the thigh to the top to stimulate drainage. Then use closed fists to vigorously massage the target areas on the thighs and buttocks, using circular strokes. 2. On the stomach: unblock built-up tissue with gentle pinches across the surface of the stomach. Then contract the abdominal muscles and, using the palm of the hand, smooth the skin outwards from the navel. Finish with circular movements upon the hips. Results: From the first application, the skin's beauty is enhanced: it is durably moisturized and is softer and smoother. After 4 week's use, dimples are reduced, orange peel skin is smoothed, the appearance of cellulite is visibly reduced (visually and upon pinching), the thigh cicumference is thinner and the silhouette is reshaped. Active Ingredients: Longan Seed: contouring active ingredient Indian Lotus extract: contouring active ingredient Red Algae: contouring active ingredient Caffeine, Cedrol: contouring active ingredients Soy: promotes collagen synthesis Alkekengi Calyx: promotes collagen synthesis, anti-free radicals action Ginkgo biloba Leaf extract: tones Shea butter: nourishes, soothes, repairs, softens and protects Sunflower and Rapeseed oils: nourish the skin Body care type Firming & Shaping Brand Sisley Size 200ml Skin Type All Types

The pair met a talented craftsman in Asia who had beautifully handcrafted several ornaments, the couple purchased and brought these items back to the UK for their families to receive. title: Baobab Collection - M Project Scented Candle - Mahary - 10cm
description:
Add a rustic touch to the home with this Mahary M Project scented candle from Baobab Collection. This Mahary candle, meaning creating in Malagasy, boasts a handcrafted raffia finish in a neutral and black striped effect, ensuring a decorative feel even when the candle is not in use. Infused with wood fire, grapefruit and eucalyptus leaf fragrance notes, this uplifting aroma is perfect for creating a welcoming environment for guests to enjoy. For full instructions on how to properly care for your Baobab candle please see our burning guide here. 
With a return to its African roots, Baobab Collection’s M Project visits the island of Madagascar, collaborating with a local cooperative to create five limited edition candles. Each scented candle takes several hours of craftsmanship with intricate weaving and the hand pouring of wax, and contributes to the economic development of the island. Inspired by the raffia weaving, the candles are a nod to the inhabitant’s ancestral knowledge, using the 100% organic natural fibre that is essential to Madagascar’s economy. 
 

Key features:
 * M Project scented candle
 * Fragrance notes: wood fire, grapefruit, eucalyptus leaves
 * Material: metal, raffia
 * Dimensions: H10cm
 * Weight: 500g
 * Burn time: 60 hours
 * Black and beige raffia finish
 * Handcrafted
 * More candles available separately

title: Kuro Cube
description:
Description

This neat little black cube efficiently purifies and refreshes the air in smaller spaces as it reduces odours. Try it in places such as drawers, closets, the car or your refrigerator. Moreover, it can be used to keep food fresh by adsorbing ethylene gas - try placing it in your fruit bowl and it will stay fresher for longer.

The Kuro Cube is made from powdered and compressed White Charcoal, which is the highest grade of charcoal available with an extremely high carbon content.

It will remains active for one year and once exhausted from relentlessly purifying the air, it makes an excellent fertiliser. Just crush it and mix with potting soil, which will nourish it and regulate its PH levels.

Read more about Sort of Coal here.

Created by Sort of Coal.

[tags]

Materials, finishes & dimensions

White Charcoal made from wood, but differs from regular charcoal in just about every other way.

[materials]

Dimensions

  • 60x60x60mm

Delivery & Returns 

Delivery

Stock items will be dispatched within 48 hours of receiving the order. Information on delivery charges.

Returns

Read the full terms and conditions.

Visit us

Want to see it before you buy? Visit the Another Country London store. All of our evergreen products are on display at the store.

Care instructions

Our White Charcoal is produced using the same methods and processes that have been used for centuries. In this ancient Japanese method, pieces of wood are baked in hand-built clay kilns, - low temperatures at first and then at extremely high temperatures with restricted oxygen. This allows carbon to be captured in the wood, a process called pyrolysis. Perfecting the difficult ritual of burning requires patience and dedication and the people who produce White Charcoal are artisans and often have a family history of being charcoal makers. Although many Asian countries produce Binchotan, Kishu Binchotan is superior due to the potent combination of the best quality Japanese Oak and the traditional unique craftsmanship.

What: These cool cards represent a new generation of African businesses setting a trend in the developing world. Cards are made from recycled paper and come with an envelope. 

How: Handmade in Rwanda and signed individually by the person who made it. 

Who: Thirty minutes is the average time it takes to make one of these cards, so every time you buy one you are making a direct difference to families affected by AIDS and war. 
Why: Help rebuild lives in Rwanda with every purchase of these beautiful cards.

title: Brabantia - Selector Laundry Bin - 55 Litres - White
description:
Create functional style in your bathroom with this Laundry Bin Selector from Brabantia. With a large 55 litre capacity this bin features a divided laundry bag and lid to create simplistic organisation to your clothes. Its practical nature means its lid can rest on the bin’s lip whilst the bag is easily removed, with ventilation holes in its steel body ensuring dirty laundry is able to breathe when it is not ready for washing. The bin is also space efficient, designed to fit against any wall or cabinet. A fabulous addition to any home it is available in two chic finishes to match a number of bathroom interiors.

Key features:
 * Elegant laundry bin with divider
 * Material: steel, plastic, cotton
 * Dimensions: H62.8xW44.5xD29.3cm
 * Capacity: 55L
 * Stylish white colour
 * Removable, machine washable laundry bag

 * Ventilation holes allow laundry to breathe

title: Millefiori - Water Soluble Fragrance - Lemon Grass - 15ml
description:
Revitalise your home with the fresh and citrus scent of the Lemon Grass water soluble fragrance by Millefiori. The aroma brings together Moroccan cedarwood, white peach, orange flowers and lemon peel. The fruity notes create a revitalising and tangy aroma that will personalise your home. Simply add a few drops to water inside the ultrasound diffuser, a humidifier or tea light oil burner to release the scent. Contained in a beautiful little glass bottle, this water soluble fragrance will perfume your home and add a touch of luxury to any living space. Please note that the Ultrasound diffuser is not included.

Key features:
 * Water soluble fragrance
 * For use with Ultrasound diffuser
 * Capacity: 15ml
 * Fragrance notes: cedarwood, white peach & lemon peels
 * Dilute a few drops of the fragrance in water
 * Fresh, tangy scent
 * Beautiful little glass bottle
 * Leaves room smelling fresh instantly
 * Wide range of Millefiori home fragrances & refills available
